item.description:
Arrive by 6:30 pm if you can. Entertainment is from 7:00 pm to 8:30 pm.

Sweet Summer Nights at Sweetwilliam Farm
Patty Keough & Buffie Groves; Boston to everywhere. Solo to 5 piece band. Originals and covers. Folk, pop, country, blues. Fun fun fun. ....myspace.com/pattykeoughwatching

A relaxing evening listening to great music, watching the sun go down and socializing with other meetup members.

Rain or Shine: Concert gets moved insde if it rains.

Food is available for purchase or bring your own.

Bring a chair or blanket and don't forget a sweater.

My cell is 508-381-1529 - call if you can't find me.

For Directions, click here:
http://www.sweetwilli...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Jacki in her purple chair and rainbow umbrella.
item.name: Sunset Concert at Sweetwilliam Farm - This Friday!
